text: <@U023YTCFFRR> *Regarding Payout are you referring to the HubSpot Partner program, Affiliate program, or HubSpot Sales quotes?* I don’t know the answer right now, but at the very least can relay this as feedback to the appropriate team if I know which functionality you’re specifically referring to.

Hey <@U023YTCFFRR> as far as I know we are not planning on adding Payoneer as a payment gateway in the marketplace. I would recommend adding this to our ideas forum here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Ideas/ct-p/ideas>

This will allow more users to be able to upvote this idea.
I will also make sure to pass this along to our marketplace team as feedback
Hey <@U023AJR4L91> please see the response on this question here: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CEQQ9NFK2/p1626098156115300?thread_ts=1625727093.105300&cid=CEQQ9NFK2>

we both doubled up on this one, just linking to mine as there’s a few different ways of interpreting this request. (I didn’t even think of the marketplace) <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CEQQ9NFK2/p1626096600115000>

As AJ noted it’s a good idea to post this to the idea forum, and also be clear what product you’re referring to.
<@U023AJR4L91> the marketplace validation CLI command would only be applicable to our own marketplace validation as we don’t have control over the validations on other marketplaces.
<@U0154FHBYLD> have you ran the `npm i -g @HubSpot/cli@next` command to upgrade to the latest beta branch of the CLI?

Hi <@U7SL518D6>,
I was referring to the HubSpot Marketplace provider program (see, <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines#what-payment-gateways-does-HubSpot-support-for-marketplace-providers->) where we Theme developers list our Themes in the HubSpot marketplace and when it gets sold we able to payout using PayPal and Stripe now. I was hoping to get Payoneer as a payout method in there.

<@U2H3TT8F2> Thanks for the Idea tip.
I've posted this request there. (see, <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Adding-more-payout-option-for-Marketplace-Providers/idi-p/457273#M87106>)

Hope it will get enough upvote so that HS-Team consider to implement it.
Yeah here’s what I get when I do that.
<@U2H3TT8F2> Thank you. Anyway, I’ve validated all my hs themes on Themeforest with version 3.0.7-beta.5
How far off are headless capabilities? :eyes: <@U22PKFRU5>
